snippet: Benckiser agreed on Monday to buy the Caribou Coffee Company for about $340 million, only five months ago after announcing a nearly $1 billion deal for Peet's Coffee & Tea.
abstract: Benckiser agreed on Monday to buy the Caribou Coffee Company for about $340 million, only five months ago after announcing a nearly $1 billion deal for Peet's Coffee & Tea.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Joh. A. Benckiser to Buy Caribou Coffee for $340 Million
